mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(dr.increment_value), 0.0) as value FROM device_readings dr LEFT JOIN devices d ON dr.device_id = d.id WHERE d.device_type = #{deviceType} AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.reading_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') = DATE_FORMAT(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H')

SELECT r.id, r.region_name as name, COALESCE(SUM(dr.increment_value), 0.0) as value FROM regions r LEFT JOIN devices d ON r.id = d.region_id AND d.device_type = #{deviceType} LEFT JOIN device_readings dr ON d.id = dr.device_id where d.device_type = #{deviceType} AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.reading_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') = DATE_FORMAT(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H') GROUP BY r.id, r.region_name
